docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

https://zhengzihao1998.github.io./

docs.title: 指令
docs.text:
Enter the project folder
    cd zhengzihao1998.github.io

Add, commit, and push your changes
    git add --all
    git commit -m "Initial commit"
    git push -u origin main

Fire up a browser and go to https://username.github.io.

docs.title: 关于我
docs.text:
一个记录笔记的网站，主要是为了资料查询和留存

\[x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}\]

docs.title: Deep Learning in Characteristics-Sorted Factor Models
docs.text:
Key Words: Cross-sectional Returns, Deep Learning, Latent Factors, Nonlinearity, Security Sorting.

Autor： Guanhao Feng, Jingyu He, Nicholas G. Polson, Jianeng Xu*

  • II.A 已实现定价误差的资产定价优化
  • II.B 特征排序因子模型的深度学习重构
  • II.C 实现Fama-French模型作为特例

docs.title: II.A
docs.text:
标准的资产定价线性因子模型基于因子风险溢价(factor risk premia)分解如下:

\[\begin{equation} E_{t-1}(r_{i,t}) = \boldsymbol{\beta_{i,t-1}^\top} \boldsymbol{\lambda_f} \end{equation}\]
